actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to require the preparation of domestic industry impact statements before Federal assistance is furnished that would result in the production abroad of manufactured goods, minerals, or services.

summary.text: Requires Federal agencies to prepare and submit to the Congress a statement setting forth the impact of potential foreign production of manufactured goods, minerals, or services on a U.S. industry before providing any Federal aid (extensions of credit or concessional sales) which would result in such production. Requires the President to ensure that such statements are prepared for all appropriate programs and to coordinate the preparation of such statements. Prohibits providing the Federal aid if the Congress enacts a joint resolution disapproving such aid.

titles.title: A bill to require the preparation of domestic industry impact statements before Federal assistance is furnished that would result in the production abroad of manufactured goods, minerals, or services.
